verbose_text: IDO activity can be induced by Th1-type cytokine IFN-gamma in parallel to neopterin production in human monocyte derived dendritic cells and macrophages [XREF_BIBR], and this mechanism indirectly contributes to increased production of AA as well as other KP metabolites [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: IDO activity can be induced by Th1-type cytokine IFN-gamma
